page.title: 19The Farmer's day in Summer 2
page.content: The milk is always fresh because it is never touched by human hands. In summer a cow pellet has 14% protein but in winter a pellet has 18%protein.It takes an hour to milk 40 cows.After I have milked all the cows I put all the milk into the big storage tank.After this I have to clean the whole parlour it takes about ninety minutes.The parlour has to be washed after every milking. The worst things of a farmers day comes next.I have to clean out the yard because in Winter the cows are kept in the yard.It takes about 2 hours then I go and have a rest.
